definition: thin piece of wood used a writing tablet (in ancient China)/a kind of official document (in former times)/letter/note/plague

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Sapporo on CX.
sentences.chinese: 国泰航空公司来回香港至札幌机票。

sentences.english: Our bus stopped in front of Sapporo's NHK.
sentences.chinese: 我们的巴士停在札幌NHK的前面。

sentences.english: We spent a day resting and going to the Snow Festival in Sapporo .
sentences.chinese: 我们休息了整整一天然后去了札幌的冰雪节。

sentences.english: Suzuki, 80, is based at Hokkaido University in Sapporo, Japan.
sentences.chinese: 铃木章，80岁，在日本札幌的北海道大学工作。

definition: Ōsaka, a city and prefecture in Japan
Hakodate, main port of south Hokkaidō 北海道[Bei3 hai3 dao4], Japan
Kōbe, major Japanese port near Ōsaka
Niigata, a city and prefecture in Japan
Hakone, city on the east coast of Japan southwest of Tokyo
Aomori prefecture at the far north of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]
Tokyo, capital of Japan/Tonkin (northern Vietnam during the French colonial period)
Nara, an old capital of Japan
